properties.event_description: Kerala Flooding causing landslides across southwest India
properties.location_description: Kunderippoyil near Shivapuram in the Iritty taluk in Kannur

properties.event_description: Kerala Flooding causing landslides across southwest India
properties.location_description: Kunderippoyil near Shivapuram in the Iritty taluk in Kannur

properties.event_description: The 270-km Jammu-Srinagar national highway remained closed for the second consecutive day on Saturday as inclement weather triggered more landslides at several places in Ramban district, traffic officials said. The traffic on the highway, the only all-weather road linking Kashmir with the rest of the country, was suspended on Friday, leaving hundreds of trucks carrying essential commodities to the valley stranded.“Several fresh landslides occurred between Panthiyal and Ramsu… due to continuous rainfall whichis hampering the road clearance operation, an official of the traffic department said. He said shooting of stones from hillocks overlooking the highway near Planthiyal was also going on. “The clearance operation was started at Cafeteria Morh near Ramban, while men and machines are ready to move to other affected areas once the weather permits, the official said. The highway is presently open to essential services only in view of the nationwide lockdown to combat the coronavirus. Whi
properties.comments: Rainfall triggered rock fall at several locations causing huge traffic standby on Jammu-Srinagar highway

properties.event_description: A landslide occurred during the construction of a road, causing two fatalities
properties.location_description: Lar village of Gool Gulab Garh in the Reasi District.

properties.event_description: Several landslides occurred in the Tuensang district on July 30th, 2018 due to continuous rain within the region. Many landslides occurred due to this rainfall event. One landslide was large enough to destroy part of NH-702 road.
properties.comments: Article reported there were many landslides but not much detail besides to the one that washed away part of the road.

properties.event_description: A landslide on the highway at Digdool in Ramban district resulted in the closure of the highway. While the highway was being cleared, another landslide hit the area trapping a JCB operator who did not survive.
properties.comments: Close to other events along same road from previous years.

properties.event_title: Landslide near construction site of the Char Dham National Highway, Ukhimath
properties.event_description: A Landslide occurred around 12 pm during the construction of a retaining wall for the Char Dham all-weather road, near the Banswara area of the Rishikesh-Kedarnath national highway, in Ukhimath of Uttarakhand's Rudraprayag district. 8 laborers died and 4 were injured.

Road traffic disrupted for 2.5 hours due to major landslide near Sanwara that spread 40m across National Highway (NH5). Several landslides occurred during rains, but the surface had settled and the landslide was triggered by excavation to make the highway wider.
A landslide in the Sangla valley blocked the highway. Karcham-Sangla road was blocked after rain.
Construction for a new hydroelectric facility caused landslides at Shongton.
properties.location_description: Near the site of a new hydroelectric facility at Shongtong Karcham in Kinnaur

properties.event_description: National Highway 305 between Rampur and Aut blocked at Bali Chowki after landslide. The area has frequent landslides due to monsoon rain and flash flooding.
properties.location_description: NH-305 between Rampur and Aut, at Bali Chowki

properties.event_title: Rock fall on Railroad tracks between Phiding and Mahur Stations
properties.event_description: A rock fall occurred at noon on the railroad tracks between Phiding and Mahur stations. The route was delayed until the tracks were cleared at 2:44 pm the same day.
properties.location_description: Railway between Phiding and Mahur station in Badarpur.

properties.event_description: A minor landslip occurred on Gunadala hill on August 15th. No injuries were reported however the residents in Vijaya Nagar Colony were shaken up after the event.
A landslide in the Chakla village in Kandaghat buried 5 people, killing one.
properties.location_description: Chakla Village, Kandaghat, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh, IND

properties.event_description: A landslide occurred in Kurseong, approximately 32 km away from Darjeeling hills. This landslide damaged a century old railway track and blocked the highway northbound to Darjeeling.
properties.location_description: Kurseong, 32 kilometres (20 miles) away from the popular hill station of Darjeeling.
properties.comments: Many landslides over the years concentrated within this city.

properties.event_description: A landslide occurred near Adyanpara in the Chaliyar panchayat after water in the Kanhirapuzha tributary rose, causing flooding and damaging houses.
properties.location_description: Nilambur-Adyanpara Rd near Chaliyar Panchaya, Kerala, IND

properties.event_description: Overnight landslides in Neriamangalam caused flooding in several areas of the city.
Flooding caused landslides near illegal granite quarrying at Thudiyurulippara near Pramadom in Konni Taluk.
properties.location_description: near a granite quarrying in the environmentally fragile Thudiyurulippara, near Pramadom, Konni

properties.event_description: Estimated date. Construction on the national highway tunnel caused a mass of rocks to collapse and block the road in Mebar Village, below Barang Village.
properties.location_description: Along National Highway 22 near Mebar Village and above Barang Village
properties.comments: Estimated date, April 2015.

properties.event_description: Seven people were killed when mudslides destroyed a house at Peringavu.
properties.comments: https://english.manoramaonline.com/news/kerala/2018/08/15/kondotty-landlside-house-buried.html  https://www.thehindu.com/news/national/kerala/rain-continues-to-pound-malappuram/article24696358.ece

properties.event_description: Heavy rains that caused devastation in August continued to cause lateral spread and land subsidence in the highlands of Kerala. It can be seen by the cracks in a house at Chittakunnu in Thrissur.
Construction laborer died after being trapped in a mudslide at a construction site of a house in Navya Nagar at Bhavya Layout on Jakkur Main Road.
Landslide triggered by rains blocks Jammu-Srinagar National Highway for 5 hours at Digdole, Ramban.
properties.comments: Close to Oct 29, 2018 event and events in earlier years.

properties.event_description: A landslide caused by rain in Belthangady led to damage of a home. No injuries were reported
Landslip occurred at the mouth of Tunnel No. 48 near Siribagilu Railway Station after continuous rain.
properties.location_description: Tunnel No. 48, Siribagilu Station, Karnataka, IND
properties.comments: 65 total landslides reported between Aug 14 and Sept. 20 along this railway.

properties.event_description: 3 people in a family sustained injuries due to a wall collapse following a landslide at Mundia Hill in Bishnupur village triggered by heavy rain from Cyclone Titli.
properties.location_description: Bishnupur village under Tigiria block near Cuttack

properties.event_description: Man died after heavy rain from Cyclone Titli caused a wall to collapse in Salepur Block.
A landslip between Kuzhithurai and Eraniel stations caused the cancellation of many trains due to flooding.
A mudslide occurred in Chakla at around 3am on the 13th, burying a family of four in their home in their sleep.

properties.event_title: Landslide on Jammu-Srinagar National Highway in Ramban
properties.event_description: Falling rocks blocked the roadway on the Jammu-Srinagar National Highway in Ramban District in Jammu. There has been prvious rock falls in the area at around the same time and warnings had been sent out for commuters to be aware. The rocks were coming from the mountains that surround the area. The highway was closed to clear the debris.
properties.location_description: Jammu-Srinagar National Highway in Ramban District
properties.comments: There has been previous reports of the area closing from snowfall.

properties.event_description: Cyclone Titli caused flooding and a landslide in Baraghara village of Gangabada panchayat in Rayagada block of Gajapati district which killed 16 people.
properties.comments: Within 25 km of events in previous years.

properties.event_description: A landslide occurred in Himachal Pradesh’s Bilaspur following incessant rainfall. Vehicular traffic has been stopped in the area.
A landslide at Plum Judy Resort near Pallivasal killed at least 11 people and prevented tourists from traveling in the area and returning to their resort from Munnar.
properties.location_description: ear Plum Judy Resort at Pallivasal
properties.comments: 11 deaths associated to the storm

properties.event_description: The route from Madikeri-Mangaluru was blocked by landslides. The traffic police blocked the stretch of highway that passes through Madikeri town by diverting traffic on an alternative route through Mekeri. This suggests the landslide occured just outside of Madikeri, allowing transporation to flow around the city.
properties.location_description: Outside of Madikeri along the Madikeri-Mangaluru highway. Close enough to the city to allow for an alternative route to reach Madikeri.

properties.event_description: Landslide of boulders and mud cut off road that connects the Kashtighar tehsil with the Doda District, around 20 km from the Doda District Headquarters. It is thought that the cause is road construction.
properties.location_description: Acha-Mod, Road that connects Kashighar tehsil with Doda District, 20 km from Doda Headquarters, India
properties.comments: Many events occur in this area.

properties.event_title: Cyclone Phethai Landslide in Vijayawada city
properties.event_description: A landslide occurred in Vijayawada city caused by the heavy rains of Cyclone Phethai. There was one fatality.
A house was crushed by a landslide at Keezhanganam hill, causing two deaths.
properties.comments: Article does not state specifically the trigger, however there were several other reported landslides in Kerala over the course of the same week which were caused by rain associated with the SW monsoon.

properties.event_description: A massive landslide occurred in Dharali (about 80km from Uttarkashi) which caused problems with clearing the highway. According to the news, material continued to fall from the hillslopes due to the rain.
properties.comments: Two days before another landslide in Dehradun.

properties.event_description: A landslide in Nilambur near Adyanpara waterfalls occurred after heavy rain, washing away a house and causing 5 fatalities.
properties.location_description: Near Adyanpara waterfalls, Malappuram, Kerala, IND

properties.event_description: Morni was had all routes cut off towards Panchkula due to landslides for about four hours on Monday. The landslides causing the closures were induced by rain. In Thathar Village 12 goats died as a result of a shed collapsing caused by a landslide.
A landslide occurred near Ramsu in Banihal at around 11 am due to heavy snowfall, blocking thru traffic for 5 hours before it was reopened again after the road was cleared.
properties.comments: This region is known for heavy snowfall during winter.

properties.event_description: Multiple major and minor landslides occurred on Kuttampuzha - Pooyamkutty Road between the 8th and the 9th causing traffic blockages and electricity disruptions. Tribal colonies in Kuttampuzha panchayat have been cut off from the mainland as a result of these hazards.
properties.location_description: Kuttampuzha - Pooyamkutty Road, Kuttampuzha, Kerala, IND

properties.event_description: SW monsoon rains leading to flooding in the area led to landslides which caused debris to fall on a family home. 5 out of the 7 inhabitants were killed and the other two were injured. This event occurred along with other landslides triggered by flooding in Kerala
properties.comments: Same day as landslides in Idukki as well as Kurangatty.

properties.event_description: A rain induced mudslide occurred in Leh, Himachal Pradesh on the evening of August 9th. Flash floods led to mudslides in Saboo and Shey villages and caused property damage as well as damage to crops in the area. No injuries or fatalities were reported.
A rain induced landslide blocked Theog-Hatkoti road causing traffic to be rerouted. Around 95 roads, including 41 in the Shimla zone and 40 in the Mandi zone, were blocked.
properties.location_description: Along the Theog-Hatkoti Hwy near Nihari

properties.event_description: A massive landslide damaged eight houses at Kand village, about 20 km from Dharamsala, on Wednesday night. The villagers have been given shelter at the Mahila Mandal Bhawan and the village community hall.  The landslide has brought down a significant portion of the hill and washed away a road and retaining walls along it.
properties.location_description: Kand village, about 20 km from Dharamsala

properties.event_description: A landslip near Hassan caused cancellation of many train routes between Sirivagilu and Yedakumari stations in the western ghats. This landslide was caused by monsoon induced rains.
properties.location_description: Between Sirivagilu and Yedakumari stations in the western ghats

properties.event_description: Incessant rains caused a landslide in Chamba near the Dunali Nazad Chhanchau area causing one death.
properties.location_description: Chamba Bypass, Surada, Chamba, Himachal Pradesh, 176310

properties.event_description: A minor, rain-induced landslide in Valook caused building damage and crop loss within the area.
A landslide on Shiradi Ghat near Gundya caused the closure of the Bengaluru-Mysore highway.
A massive landslide on the Gangotri highway in Uttarakhand has left 700 pilgrims stranded.

At Karikkottakkari in the eastern hill areas of Kannur district of Kerala, a lanslip occurred on August 8th. in an accident caused by a landslip in the area on Wednesday. This landslide occurred at Ayyankunnu grama panchayat under the Karikkottakkari police station limits.

An elderly man was killed during a landslide in Pithoragarh after being hit by a boulder and pushed into a waterfall. This landslide was caused by rains that had been persistent in the region over the past 24 hours.
a couple identified as Mohanan (52) and Shobhana (41) was found dead in a landslide which occurred at Kurangatty near Adimaly.
A stretch of 300 m on NH-154 was buried under debris after a landslide occurred at Kotropi triggered by heavy rainfall and previous minor landslides.
properties.location_description: Kotropi, Mandi District, Himachal Pradesh, IND

properties.event_description: In the Tal Valley a landslide occurred with 4 meters of uplift along a 200 meter long and 25 meter wide part of the river consisting of complex rotational and slump processes.
properties.location_description: Tal River, Rajajii National Park, Uttarakhand, IND
properties.comments: Estimated date.

properties.event_description: A landslide caused by damages from the Gaja cyclone killed 4 construction workers in at Chinnapallam, Kodaikanal, Tamil Nadu. Multiple uprooted trees fell on the road. Further damage is reported across the region.
properties.comments: The specific location the construction workers were working in is unmentioned.

properties.event_description: Landslide in the Junglewad (Jangalwar) area of Doda blocked the Batote-Kishtwar national highway for 3 hours, with heavy machinery needed to clear the debris.
properties.location_description: NH-244, Jangalwar, Doda, Jammu & Kashmir, IND

properties.event_title: Laborer from Jharkhand dies in landslip
properties.event_description: A laborer from Jhakhand died in a landslip that occurred in a construction site at Yedappalli near Coonoor in the Nilgiris. The site was a private hospital under construction. A huge slice of mud slipped from at least 25 feet high when laborers were engaging in earth work. A 24-year-old man was buried alive in mud while three other workers sustained minor injuries.
properties.location_description: Construction site at Yedappalli near Conoor, Nilgiris, Tamil Nadu, India

properties.event_description: A massive landslide occurred around 11:30PM completely blocked the National Highway 29 (Kohima-Dimapur road), the lifeline of Nagaland and Manipur, near Chumukedima police check gate under Dimapur district, which has affected the movement of vehicles.
properties.location_description: 1 km away from Chumukedima police check gate on Kohima-Dimapur road, Dimapur, Nagaland, 797113

properties.event_description: 5 family members were killed after a landslide triggered by overnight rains hit their mud house.
properties.location_description: Bhotli, Gandoh area of Doda District, Kashmir, IND

properties.event_description: Landslide occurred in Makkimala during monsoon season, leaving 2 dead.
properties.comments: Same day as many events in Wayanad District

properties.event_title: Landslides kills nine-year-old girl in Jammu and Kashmir, India
properties.event_description: Landslides triggered by incessant rains closed the strategic Jammu-Srinagar highway. A nine-year-old-girl has died and three of her relatives have been injured in the Rajouri District of Jammu and Kashmir, India.
properties.comments: Incessant rains caused multiple landslides in Ramban district during the week.

properties.event_description: 4 Children were playing in a dried 10ft deep water tank. The playing appears to have disturbed the ground, resulting in a mudslide and the children dying.
Seven people died when a landslide on the Batote-Kishtwar Highway hit a vehicle at Kuligad near Thathri during the rainy season.
properties.location_description: Kuligad, Thathri, Doda, Jammu & Kashmir, IND
properties.comments: Unable to locate Kuligad.

properties.event_description: A landslide that shut down a stretch of the Jammu-Srinagar highway in Ramban district. One man was kidded after being hit by rubble sliding down mountain sides in Digdol area.
properties.comments: Night-long rains in Ramban district triggered the landslide. Multiple landslide were reported.

properties.event_description: A landslide induced by heavy rain from the day prior fell on the Kangra-Chandigarh National Highway, causing closure in both lanes for hours.
properties.location_description: Kangra-Chandigarh National Highway, Himachal Pradesh, IND

properties.event_description: 300 villagers were able to escape a debris flow in Kurichiyarmala during monsoon season that destroyed 100 acres of tea plantations and a government school.
properties.comments: Occurred on same day as many other events in Wayanad.

properties.event_description: The Shimla-Kalla heritage railway track was blocked by a landslide.
properties.location_description: Shimla-Kalka Road, Chaura Maidan, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh, 171004

properties.event_description: Landslide during monsoon season washed into the police station in Vythiri gram panchayat. Additonally, a 2 story shopping complex sank to the ground.
properties.comments: Landslide occurred on same day as many other events in Wayanad district.

properties.event_description: During India's rainy season a landslide occurred on the Theog-Hatkoti-Rohru Highway blocking the road, but was cleared after 24 hours. This was one slide of many in the area causing various traffic delays.
2 people were killed after their house was destroyed in a landslide in Keezhanganam.
Landslip occurred at Parakkamala in Kannur.
Landslide triggered by rain occurred at Kheri near Udhampur, blocking the Jammu-Srinagar National Highway and causing heavy traffic even after the debris was cleared.
Flooding from continuous rain induced a landslide on top of a hill in Upputhode that swept away four people as well as damaged acres of land.
4 major landslips occurred in 2 days in the forest areas of Athavand Hills including a massive landslip close to an illegal quarry in Cherumkad that killed 10 members of 3 families.
Soil landslip occurred at Trikkalangode panchayat near semi-hilly Manjeri following heavy rain.

properties.event_title: Landslip at Anpathi Monnam Mile Forest
properties.event_description: Landslip formed a lake on two acres of forestland at Anpathi moonnam mile forest under the Begur range of forest in North Wayanad.
properties.location_description: Anpathi moonnam mile forest, Begur Range, Wayanad, IND

properties.event_description: One woman died on the way to Manimahesh due to a landslide at Sundrasi triggered by heavy rains.
Road connecting Chamba to Tissa was closed due to a landslide. Landslide was captured on video.
A landslide was reported as interrupting an actor's travel schedule to/through Kullu Manali. No further details given

properties.event_title: Landslide on Chandigargh-Manali HWY near Banala
properties.event_description: A 4 lane highway was temporarily blocked as a result of a land and rockslide. This was a result of deep cutting on the hilltop side of the road.
properties.comments: While no picture is available, the news report has a linked video recording.

properties.event_description: Landslide occurred on the Jammu-Srinagar National Highway at Maroog (Marog) between Banihal and Ramban stranding hundreds of vehicles.
properties.location_description: NH-44, Maroog, Banihal, Ramban, Jammu & Kashmir
properties.comments: Although trigger is not stated in article, it is likely due to rain during India's monsoon season.

properties.event_description: One person died due to a landslide triggered by rain at Vettikuzhi in Athirappilly.
Multiple landslips occurred along the Plappally-Pampa stretch of the Sabarimala Road.
A massive landslip occurred between Madikeri and Sampaje that washed away five people.
Heavy landslide hindered vehicular movement on the Chandigarh-Manali Highway beyond Mandi Town after continuous rain heavily hit the Kullu district of Himachal Pradesh.
properties.location_description: NH3, Mandi Town, Kullu, Himachal Pradesh, IND
properties.comments: Accuracy is low due to lack of detail in article.

properties.event_description: A massive landslide hit the Jammu-Srinagar highway in Jammu and Kashmir's Ramban district. Three truckers went missing.
properties.location_description: Jammu-Srinagar highway in Battery Chashma area, Ramban, Jammu & Kashmir, 182144
properties.comments: Incessant rains caused multiple landslides in Ramban district during the week.

properties.event_description: Resident claimed foundation of home in Priyandarshini Cholony sank to a depth of 30 cm as Boys Town continues to be destroyed by land subsidence. A 50 km long crack runs from Thirunelli to Boys Town in Manthavady taluk, with some places experiencing 6 m deep fissures.
properties.location_description: Priyadarshini, Boys Town, Wayanad, Kerala, IND

properties.event_description: Srinagar-Jammu NH blocked due to landslide near Anokhi Falls.
A road at Thacharakolly in Thirunelli was destroyed by a landslip during monsoon season.
properties.comments: Occurred on same day as many other events in Wayanad District.

properties.event_description: 12 landslides occurred in one month along the 19 km stretch of ghat road between Kulamavu to Painavu.
properties.comments: Landslide trigger is not state, but time of year is known to have heavy rains in this region from monsoons.

properties.event_description: 14 people died when a van fell into River Bhagirathi following a landslide along the Rishikesh-Gangotri Highway.
properties.location_description: Bhagirathi River, Rishikesh-Gangotri Highway, Uttarkashi, Uttarakhand, IND

properties.event_description: At the third bend in the road, a landslide occurred along a 1km strip. It took 3 hours to clear the road.
properties.location_description: "Hairpin Bend 3", SH-78, Valparai, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, 642105
properties.comments: Previously cataloged as 133108. Updated for location accuracy.

properties.event_description: Passengers on the Heritage Nilgiris Mountain Rail were stranded near Kallar on the way to Udhagamandalam (Ooty) from Mettupalayam. The track was blocked at 3 places between Aderley and Hillgrove stations due to landslides.
properties.location_description: Kallar, Nilgiris District, Tamil Nadu, IND

properties.event_description: 35 people were rescued from the landslide that hit Nelliampathy on August 19th. This landslide was caused by flooding in Kerala.

Landslide triggered by rain and flooding at Vellayamkudy near Kattappana on the Puliyanmala-Thodupuzha highway covered a workshop building and waiting shed in 12 feet of debris and destroyed another commercial building.

properties.event_title: Kumily Panchayat Waste Management Plant Landslide
properties.event_description: A landslide hit the Kumily Panchayat Waste Management Plant which caused waste to wash downhill and accumulate in low-lying areas.
Road damaged by landslip near Munnar in Idukki, Kerala during monsoon season.
Landslide triggered by rains blocked the Shimla-Hatkoti road near Nihari.

properties.event_title: Double Flow-Typle Landslide in Kerala, India
properties.event_description: A double flow type landslide was recorded in vicinity of Kerala, India on or around 21 November 2018.
properties.comments: The AGU Blogger breaks down further landslide details in the blog.

properties.event_description: Landslip occurred on the road connecting Hijjanahalli in Sakleshpur and Somwarpet in Kodagu.
Landslip occurred along Pothundi-Nelliampathy Road near Palakkad.
properties.comments: Landslide trigger was not mentioned in article, however many small landslips occur in this area due to India's monsoon season.

properties.event_title: Puttila in Bilinele village of Puttur taluk Landslide
properties.event_description: A landslide cut off the road in Puttila in Bilinele village of Puttur taluk that caused a farmer and his family to be trapped.
properties.location_description: Puttila in Bilinele village of Puttur taluk, Karnataka, IND

properties.event_description: A landslide struck at Kulligad on the Kishtwar-Paddar road which killed 4 people and injured 9.
A man's farm was destroyed by a landslide following the August rains and flooding in Kerala. He moved to Kakka City after a landslide destroyed his home in Vimala City.
properties.location_description: Kakka City, Konnathady Panchayat, Idukki District, Kerala

properties.event_description: In Vimala City, a landslide destroyed one man's house killing his daughter and forcing him to relocate.
properties.comments: Estimated date.

properties.event_title: Landslide in Nagaland cuts off Impl-Dmpur road
properties.event_description: A massive landslide occurred near Kukidolong village in Nagaland cut-off Imphal-Dimapur road since the past few days. the landslide occurred after explosion for stone quarrying at the site on October 29 and the NH-2 road remains cut-off since then. Many Manipur bound trucks and passenger vehicles are stranded at various places in Nagaland even as officials informed that restoration work would take at least two days.
properties.location_description: Imphal-Dimapur road near Kukidolong village, Nagaland
properties.comments: The landslide seems to be a human-induced event after explosion.

properties.event_description: Following heavy rains and flooding there was a suspected landslip on Mattikkunnu Hill near the Kannappankundu River in Puthuppadi.
properties.location_description: Mattikkunnu Hill, Kannappankundu Village, Puthuppadi, Kozhikode, IND
properties.comments: Close to Aug 9, 2018 event.

properties.event_description: A minor landslip caused by heavy rain and wind occurred on the railway between Chalakkudy-Karukutty.
Four houses were destroyed and 12 people killed due to a rain induced landslide in Kuranchery.
properties.comments: limited access to article

properties.event_description: A rain induced mudslide destroyed multiple homes and killed two children in Oorkadavu on the morning of August 16th.
properties.comments: 10 other landslides occured in the region

properties.event_description: A landslip at Erumapetty buried 3 people.
A woman were killed in floods and landslips that occurred near Sholayar Dam Power House II.
properties.location_description: Occurred on a private road near Sholayar Dam Power House II.

properties.event_description: At the third bend in the road, a landslide occurred along a 1km strip. It took 3 hours to clear the road.
properties.location_description: Pollachi Valparai Road, Valparai, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, 642127
properties.comments: Represents multiple slides and rock falls

properties.event_description: A landslide near Ramshila blocked the Kullu-Manali highway for multiple hours. Traffic was blocked. They are cutting hills along the road to expand the highway which was likely the cause.

properties.event_description: 10 major landslips and other minor ones occurred over 14 km between Jodupala and Madikeri town on the Mangaluru-Madikeri-Mysuru National Highway.
properties.location_description: between Jodupala and Madikeri town on the Mangaluru-Madikeri-Mysuru National Highway
properties.comments: Estimated date.

Landslip blocked road between Kothai and Kharapathar near Patti Dhank due to rain during monsoon season.
properties.location_description: Patti Dhank, Shimla-Hatkoti Road, Himachal Pradesh, IND

properties.event_description: Landslide in the Junglewad area of Doda blocked the Batote-Kishtwar national highway for many hours, with heavy machinery needed to clear the debris.

properties.location_description: Vidyagiri Residency, Outer Ring Road, Nagarabhavi, Bengaluru, Karnataka, 560072

properties.event_description: 5 family members were killed after a landslide triggered by overnight rains hit their mud house.

properties.event_description: Doda-Thathri road closed to traffic for many hours after a landslide struck at night following heavy rains.

properties.event_description: 800 students were stranded in the remote Holi area of Bharmour after a landslide hit Himachal's Chamba district.
Jammu-Srinagar highway blocked due to landslide near Samroli in Udhampur following continuous rainfall.
Jammu-Srinagar highway blocked due to landslide in Ramsoo following continuous rainfall.
Jammu-Srinagar highway blocked due to landslide in Kheeri, Magarkoot following continuous rainfall.

properties.event_description: Flash flooding from monsoon rains caused a landslide in Chamba district that killed 60 sheep and goats.

properties.event_description: Over 40 landslides occurred in catchment areas of the Banasura Sugar Dam in Wayand district after torrential monsoon rains in August. Landslides occurred at Bible Land, Karimpinthode, Kattimada, Valanchola, and Elikka.

properties.event_description: Landslide cuts off NH 10 in Sevok, 28 km from Siliguri in West Bengal.

Shallow landslides that transitioned to channelized flows occurred Aug 15-17 in Kodagu District following monsoon rains and flooding. Landslides may be due to other factors such as environmental degradation.

properties.event_description: After 2 continuous days of rain landslides hit many areas in Itanagar and Naharlaugn damaging many houses and resulting in 5 fatalities.
After continuous and heavy rain a landslide damaged 4 houses and killed 2 children in Banglagudde near Gurupur.

properties.event_title: Driver dies in Mori area Landslide
properties.event_description: Driver of hydraulic excavator was killed in a landslide after heavy rains caused boulders to fall from the hillside at Thising in Mori area of Uttarkashi district while doing construction of a motor road.
A large part of National Highway 10 between Rambhi and Teesta Bazar was washed away by the Teesta River following landslides triggered by heavy rains.
properties.location_description: NH-10, , West Rambhi - Teesta Bazar, Rengal, 734226

properties.event_description: After heavy rain, landslide of illegally dumped muck broke through crate wall and traveled down McLeod Ganj hillside damaging houses near Kala Pul on the Dharamsala-McLeod Ganj road.
properties.location_description: near Kala Pul on the Dharamsala-McLeod Ganj road

properties.event_description: Landslide of soil, rock, and trees sliding down from the Kuthiran mountain above halted work at the Kuthiran tunnels.
Rain in North Sikkim caused many landslides in Gangtok including one at Ambithang that cut Gangtok off from Mangan. Multiple other landslides were reported in the area.
Rain in North Sikkim caused landslides in Dzongu including a landslide near Mantam Lake that cut off areas of upper Dzongu.
Rain in north Sikkim caused landslide in Mangan.

properties.event_description: Landslide at Leh in Jammu and Kashmir completely damaged a car.
1 lakh of cubic meters of earth came crashing down on the tracks near Yedekumeri railway station.

properties.event_description: At least four members of a family, including two children below the age of five years, were killed when a massive landslide swept away their house in Mizoram’s Aizawl on Friday night. Two others sustained injuries.

160 Km from Maharashtra's capital Mumbai, a small village called Taliye in the Raigad district saw one of the worst tragedies in the state in decades as 85 people lost their lives in a landslide.  On Thursday, 22 July, a massive hillock came crashing down on the village razing to the ground 35-40 houses on its way.
